info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:52AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fisher County through 945 AM CDT... At 851 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hudd, or 9 miles northwest of Hobbs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rotan, Roby, Sylvester, Hobbs, Longworth, Mccaulley, Hitson, Gannon, Busby and Capitola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
